title: Online Forensic Science Laboratory Education: Project-Based Learning Grounded in Universal Design for Learning (UDL)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational forensic science theory and understanding of laboratory safety protocols
context.additional_context: Intensive education utilizing virtual/hybrid experimental tools in digitally supported environments

learning_goals: They can perform forensic evidence analysis procedures with 90% accuracy in a virtual lab environment designed according to UDL principles.
Through team-based PBL tasks, participants can write crime scenario analysis reports using digital forensics tools.
Participants can share experimental results with peers and instructors via interactions on an online Learning Management System (LMS) at least 80% of the time.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
